Test Name: INHERITED SKELETAL MUSCLE CHANNELOPATHY GENE PANEL, VARIES
Specimen Type: DNA extracted from patient specimens (source specimen not specified)
Purpose: To analyze gene variants in skeletal muscle ion channel genes for accurate diagnosis of inherited skeletal muscle channelopathies.
Equipment: DNA extraction systems, Agilent Bioanalyzer, next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent)
